column4: why does the browser in the ubuntu live cd version not have flash plugin..and i cant install it cause it's live cd
It's always been that way Rix. If you use a USB drive you can upgrade right to the USB drive.

My sound stopped working. It is now affecting a lot of my applications. I'm on Maverick and when I click on the sound icon (which has --- next to it) it shows no options. How can I fix this without having to restart? It's not the first time it's happened.
